text: Oh Nina enikholwayo! Sebenzisani izinto ezinhle kulokho enikuzuzile futhi nakulokho esinivezele kona okuvela emhlabathini, futhi ningahlosi ukwenza okungcolile kukona, ukukusebenzisa kepha nibe ningeke nikuthatha ngaphandle kokuba uma nivale amehlo enu kukona, futhi nazi ukuthi uMvelinqangi akadingi lutho ufanele ukudunyiswa
